summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in block 47, S.A. Bell's Addition and block 5, 12th Avenue Addition, being the alley between Boren Avenue and Minor Avenue, from Pike Street to Union Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 96829 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
